verses.verse: And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H4033>stranger,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> being <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> was <S%H7462>feeding<s%> the <S%H6629>flock<s%> with his <S%H251>brothers;<s%> and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> was with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> and with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%> their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1681>report.<s%>

Now <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> more than <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of his <S%H2208>old<s%> age: and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors.<s%>

And when his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him more than <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him, and <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> to him.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and he <S%H5046>told<s%> it his <S%H251>brothers:<s%> and they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H3254>more.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed:<s%>

For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we were <S%H481>binding<s%> <S%H485>sheaves<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and, <S%H2009>see,<s%> my <S%H485>sheaf<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and also <S%H5324>stood<s%> upright; and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> your <S%H485>sheaves<s%> stood <S%H5437>round<s%> about, and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to my <S%H485>sheaf.<s%>

And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Shall you indeed <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? or shall you indeed have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over us? And they <S%H8130>hated<s%> him <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H3254>more<s%> for his <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> and for his <S%H1697>words.<s%>

And he <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> it his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H5750>more;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%> to me.

And he <S%H5608>told<s%> it to his <S%H1>father,<s%> and to his <S%H251>brothers:<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2472>dream<s%> that you have <S%H2492>dreamed?<s%> Shall I and your <S%H517>mother<s%> and your <S%H251>brothers<s%> indeed <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7812>bow<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> ourselves to you to the <S%H776>earth?<s%>
And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> him; but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8104>observed<s%> the <S%H1697>saying.<s%>
And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>flock<s%> in <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> Do not your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> the flock in <S%H7927>Shechem?<s%> <S%H3212>come,<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you to them. And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H7200>see<s%> whether it be <S%H7965>well<s%> with your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H6629>flocks;<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> me <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%> So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> him out of the <S%H6010>vale<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> him, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he was <S%H8582>wandering<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> you?
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H251>brothers:<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H375>where<s%> they <S%H7462>feed<s%> their flocks.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> They are <S%H5265>departed<s%> <S%H2088>hence;<s%> for I <S%H8085>heard<s%> them <S%H559>say,<s%> Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%> And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> them in <S%H1886>Dothan.<s%>

And when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H7350>afar<s%> off, even <S%H2962>before<s%> he <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to them, they <S%H5230>conspired<s%> <S%H834>against<s%> him to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1976>this<s%> <S%H1167>dreamer<s%> <S%H2472><s%> <S%H935>comes.<s%>

<S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, and let us <S%H2026>slay<s%> him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> and we will <S%H559>say,<s%> Some <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> him: and we shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> of his <S%H2472>dreams.<s%>
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him out of their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Let us not <S%H5221>kill<s%> him.

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8210>Shed<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> but <S%H7993>cast<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%> that is in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H7971>lay<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> on him; that he might <S%H5337>rid<s%> him out of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> to <S%H7725>deliver<s%> him to his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> that they <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out of his <S%H3801>coat,<s%> his <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors<s%> that was <S%H5921>on<s%> him;
And they <S%H3947>took<s%> him, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> him into a <S%H953>pit:<s%> and the <S%H953>pit<s%> was <S%H7386>empty,<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in it.

And they <S%H3427>sat<s%> down to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread:<s%> and they <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H736>company<s%> of <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> with their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H5219>spices<s%> and <S%H6875>balm<s%> and <S%H3910>myrrh,<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> to <S%H3381>carry<s%> it <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1215>profit<s%> is it <S%H3588>if<s%> we <S%H2026>slay<s%> our <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H3680>conceal<s%> his <S%H1818>blood?<s%>

<S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H4376>sell<s%> him to the <S%H3459>Ishmeelites,<s%> and let not our <S%H3027>hand<s%> be on him; for he is our <S%H251>brother<s%> and our <S%H1320>flesh.<s%> And his <S%H251>brothers<s%> were <S%H8085>content.<s%>

Then there <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H4084>Midianites<s%> <S%H5503>merchants;<s%> and they <S%H4900>drew<s%> and <S%H5927>lifted<s%> up <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> out of the <S%H953>pit,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> to the <S%H3459>Ishmeelites<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was not in the <S%H953>pit;<s%> and he <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>
And he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3206>child<s%> is not; and I, <S%H575>where<s%> shall I <S%H935>go?<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and <S%H7819>killed<s%> a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood;<s%>

And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H3801>coat<s%> of many <S%H6446>colors,<s%> and they <S%H935>brought<s%> it to their <S%H1>father;<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> have we <S%H4672>found:<s%> <S%H5234>know<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> whether it be your <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3801>coat<s%> or <S%H3808>no.<s%>

And he <S%H5234>knew<s%> it, and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H3801>coat;<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> has <S%H398>devoured<s%> him; <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is <S%H2963>without<s%> doubt <S%H2963>rent<s%> in pieces.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> on his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H56>mourned<s%> for his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> him; but he <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> For I will <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H7585>grave<s%> to my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H57>mourning.<s%> Thus his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> for him.

And the <S%H4092>Midianites<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> an <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh's,<s%> and <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard.<s%>
